ing: 1 (4.5 ounce) can shrimp, drained and chopped
des: "Perfect for all you shrimp lovers out there, this dip or salad dressing is refreshing and goes great with your favorite cracker or vegetables. If you don't have cider vinegar, you can use pickle juice."
ins:
In a medium bowl, combine sour cream, salt, chili sauce, relish, cider vinegar, onion, shrimp, lemon juice and ground black pepper. Mix well.
Adjust seasoning and chill before serving.
